SQL.statement: INSERT INTO MUDCC ( IndexKey1, IndexKey2, VCHAR20, LVCHAR, BLOB30 ) VALUES (1, '2', 'SAN JOSE', ' LV ', BLOB('BLOB30'))
INSERT INTO MUDCC ( IndexKey1, IndexKey2, VCHAR20, LVCHAR, BLOB30 ) VALUES (2, '2', 'Tucson', ' lv ', BLOB('clob30'))
INSERT INTO MUDCC ( IndexKey1, IndexKey2, VCHAR20, LVCHAR, BLOB30 ) VALUES (2, '3', 'Wichita', ' LV ', BLOB('BLOB30'))
update MUDCC set VCHAR20 = 'aJ<)5Y6_%1)H@LYJ' where IndexKey2 like '2%'
delete from MUDCC where (IndexKey1 = 2 and IndexKey2 like '3%')
